questions.text: Dear Participant,

Research Group on Transportation at Sapinza University in Rome is currently investigating the sense of security of individuals in taxis in both developed and developing countries. The aim of this research is to identify the causes of insecurity and propose solutions to create a safer taxi system in the future. Additionally, we aim to reduce the gap between women and men, different social and economic classes in urban planning, and create a secure society for all people regardless of any classification
This questionnaire consists of 8 pages and answering it will take approximately 10 to 15 minutes.

The questionnaire consists of three sections. The first section includes demographic questions about yourself, which helps us match different preferences with different types of people. The second section includes several questions about your current use of taxis and your preferences in this regard. Finally, the third section includes questions about your awareness of security in taxis and your preferences for designing a safer taxi system in the future. All answers will be collected anonymously.
If you have any questions or would like to discuss this research further, please contact us via the email below
m.afsary@gmail.com
We appreciate the time you spend answering this questionnaire
what is your gender?
how old are you?
What is your highest level of education?
What is your current employment status?
How many people live in your immediate family? Please write the total number of people, including yourself?
Can you tell how your family's income compares to other families in your community?

sections.title: Factors related to the modes of travel

questions.text: How many years of driving experience do you have?

options.text: 0 (Because I don't have a driving license)
0 (Because I don't have confidence in driving a car)

questions.text: How many cars does your family own?
How many motorcycles does your family own?
How far is the walking distance from your home to the nearest metro or bus station that you usually use?
How often do you go on city trips? (such as school, workplace or for shopping and entertainment)

options.text: with irregular intervals or without setting time

questions.text: What destinations do you most travel to?
Which modes of transportation do you use the most? Select more than one option if desired

options.text: Agency or internet taxis such as Tapsi or Snap

questions.text: Online shared taxi is a service that, by using mobile applications, users can share their trips with other passengers on the same route, reduce costs and optimize transportation.
Please choose based on your experience using a taxi

options.text: I have used taxis in the city
I have used shared online taxis
I have used both regular and online shared taxi services

questions.text: How do you evaluate the security of taxis?
How secured do you feel when you are using a taxi with a 'familiar person'?
How secured do you feel when you are using a taxi with 'strange women'?
How secured do you feel when you are using a taxi with 'strange men'?
How secured do you feel when you use a taxi 'during the day'?
How secured do you feel when you use a taxi ' during the night '?
How secured do you feel when you use a taxi in 'urban areas'?
How secured do you feel when you use a taxi in the 'Outside the city Areas'?
Do you have a preference for the 'gender of the driver' of the shared taxi?

options.text: Yes, I prefer male driver because they drive better and safer
Yes, I prefer a male driver, because I feel secured with a male driver
Yes, I prefer female driver because they drive better and safer
Yes, I prefer a female driver, because I feel secured with a female driver

questions.text: Do you think your willingness or unwillingness to talk to strangers might influence your choice of taxi service?

options.text: Yes, it has an effect, I like to talk to people
Yes, it has an effect, I feel uncomfortable talking to strangers
It does not affect my choice
No, it doesn't matter, although I like to talk to people
No, it doesn't matter, although I feel uncomfortable talking to strangers

questions.text: Safety refers to protecting people from unintentional hazards and incidents such as accidents and vehicle breakdowns, while security is concerned with protecting people from intentional threats such as theft and criminal attacks.
In each section, please rate the importance of the issue in using a taxi on a scale of 1-5, where 1 means 'not important' and 5 means 'very important'
security
safety
Convenience and ease (such as having an air conditioner, comfortable seats, etc.)
Travel time
Car cleanliness
Taxi fares

Sexual harassment includes intentional and inappropriate sexual behavior, such as inappropriate physical contact. While imaginary sexual harassment is the unpleasant feeling caused by a person's interpretation or personal sensitivities that they imagine sexual intent in the behavior of others, this intent may not be real.
Have you ever had an unpleasant experience involving sexual harassment while using a taxi?
Have you ever experienced an unpleasant touch, or an unpleasant feeling from the behavior of the driver or other passengers while using a taxi? (Imaginary sexual harassment)
Have you ever witnessed any sexual harassment or making other passengers feel uncomfortable while using a taxi?
Have you ever heard from people who were sexually harassed in a taxi or had an unpleasant feeling from the behavior of the driver or other passengers?
Have you ever heard or read about sexual harassment in a taxi through the media or newspapers?
Have you ever been robbed or witnessed a robbery while using a taxi?
Do you care about the social class of other passengers when using a taxi?
Have you ever hesitated to take a taxi because of concern about your social image?
How often do you go to a religious place (such as church, mosque, etc.)?
How often do you engage in private religious activities, such as prayer, meditation, etc.?
Do family restrictions directly affect your decisions about how to travel?
Do you take your family's advice into account when deciding about mode of transportation ?

Pink transportation refers to services that are specifically designed for women and aim to provide a safer and more comfortable travel experience, such as women-only taxis or separate spaces on buses and subways for women.
Do you think that pink transportation has given an appropriate answer to the security issue?

Security apps are usually designed to help travelers stay safer on their travels. Some of the features of these applications include tracking, sending emergency messages, or reporting anti-social behavior or vandalism.
Have you ever downloaded or purchased a security app?
Do you have privacy concerns using these types of apps?
What is your preference when facing any security problem in a taxi?

options.text: Direct phone call to the transportation provider center and report the issue
Using security applications and reporting the issue anonymously
The use of security applications and the possibility of reporting the issue with personal or anonymous information

questions.text: How much more would you be willing to pay for a taxi that implements enhanced security measures? Such as tracking the vehicle's route, and verifying the driver's identity. Please indicate your willingness to pay a percentage increase from the standard fare

options.text: I'm not willing to spend more for additional security.

questions.text: Please rate the importance of each topic on a scale of 1-5, where 1 is 'not important' and 5 is 'very important'
Send your location or taxi information to trusted contacts while using a taxi.
Implement real-time driver tracking feature to enhance security
Implementing surveillance features such as the use of in-cab surveillance cameras to add security and monitoring during trips
If you have any experience or ideas related to this research, we would be very happy for you to share them with us.
